Nighlight::

Nighlight gave a Trinity a kiss in her forehead, hoping that its calm 
her down after that she continued singing trying to do that the child 
forgets her awful dreams.

--- In nbwrpg@egroups.com, logomorph@h... wrote:
> Trinity::
> 
> She fell  into a deeper sleep, but still it was fitful.  She 
muttered 
> in her sleep, whispering,"mama....no..I..no..wanna...go.."
